alert.note: Alert for Clay; Quitman (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 2:41PM EDT until June 13 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Clay County in southwestern Georgia... Quitman County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/. * At 241 PM EDT/141 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clio, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Georgetown, Ariton, Shorterville, Wire Bridge, Hayes, Watson Crossroads, Scottsboro Crossroads, Ricks Place, Pecan, Thomas Mill Creek, Phillips Crossroads, Hatcher, Morris, Bethel, Hwy 231 Pea River Bridge, Fort Gaines-Clay Airport, Skipperville and Hardwickburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
